prompt: <description>Part 1 Instructions Shape Description Construct a slightly tapered rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sketch consists of three faces, each made up of one or more loops and lines, arcs, or circles. *Face 1* 1. Draw Line 1 from 0,0 to 0.75,0. 2. Draw Line 2 from 0.75,0 to 0.75,0.45. 3. Add any additional details such as color, material, or other properties as necessary.</description>
